job description:
Overview

DECISIVE ANALYTICS Corporation is seeking software engineers interested in the exciting field of machine learning software development. In this role, you will work on exciting national security problems and help our clients turn their sea of data into actionable information. Working as part of a talented team, you will work at the intersection of software engineering, machine learning, and the standard big data technology stack.

Responsibilities
  • Develop user interface and data access components to incorporate analytic results into user workflows
  • Ensure software components are scalable and secure for integration into customer cloud enterprises
  • Implement and integrate cutting edge algorithms to answer complex questions using massive collections of text, video, and imagery data.
  • Execute standard software development activities including design, development, implementation, test, documentation, and support using agile software engineering principles
Qualifications
  • US Citizen
  • Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline
  • 1-3 years of experience developing software in Java in industry or course work
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills
  • Strong team player who can effectively contribute to project development
Desired Experience:
  • Experience with or course work exposure to standard big data technologies (e.g., MapReduce, Spark, Storm)
  • Demonstrated interest in machine learning algorithms through course work or projects
EEO statement

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, protected veteran status or disability.VEVRAA Federal Contractor
